messages.title: YOUR CHOICE ON THURSDAY:
messages.content: The boost that our NHS and social care need with the Liberal Democrats. OR Labour who are too busy fighting with each other to fight for our NHS.

messages.title: THIS THURSDAY STOP THE NHS CUTS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats propose a £6 billion extra per year, raised from a 1p income tax rise, to be spent on NHS and social care.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour mentioned as too busy fighting, Conservatives can’t win.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Tactical voting consideration stating Conservatives can't win in the area.

issues.health: Proposing a £6 billion extra per year for the NHS and social care, funded by a 1p income tax rise.

images.caption: Liberal Democrat vote will give our NHS the boost it needs.
